title: "complete 4 more worlds missions"
body: i havent gotten anymore missions after i did the first few, do i have to buy them or will they come out soon?

replies.body:
Did the first few missions.
Bought a key fragment with the tokens to make a key. (I had 2 already)
Opened a box.
Got an Ivern Champion shard.
I own all champions.
Well played Riot, well played.
Just wait, 2 new free miss should come every week during the WT2017
missions dont take long to complete a week seems rather long
